hero.title: I'm a Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: Building modern web applications with React and Laravel

hero.title: Support your team with a professional frontend developer
hero.subtitle: Independent professional development, transparent processes, and result-oriented approach.

about.heading: Professional Introduction
about.p1: As a Frontend Developer, I build user-friendly web applications using modern technologies and best practices. I love following clean code principles and component-based development.
about.p2: My experience includes working with React.js, Laravel, and Tailwind CSS. I'm particularly interested in performance optimization and following modern UI/UX trends. In my projects, I always strive for responsive design and accessibility.
about.p3: I actively develop myself through online courses and personal projects. I enjoy working in teams where we help each other's growth through knowledge sharing and code reviews.

2019.title: HTML & CSS Basics
2019.desc: First project: creating a static portfolio page.

2020.title: JavaScript and SPA
2020.desc: ToDo App development with ES6+ and modular structure.

2021.title: React Portfolio
2021.desc: Creating a React-based portfolio site with Tailwind CSS.

2022.title: Freelance Projects
2022.desc: Working on websites for small and medium businesses.

2023-2024.title: Continuous Growth
2023-2024.desc: Courses, real client projects, new technologies.

scrimba.title: Scrimba – The Frontend Developer Career Path
scrimba.desc: During the Frontend Developer Career Path course, I mastered modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, and Git version control. The course developed my problem-solving skills and clean code writing ability through practical projects.

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.intro:
Have an idea or want to start a website?
Write to me or call me - I'd be happy to discuss it with you in person!
contact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.
